column3: Latest;Sihanoukville:  Two Chinese suspects were arrested at about 1 am on April 8 following a bag snatch attempt in front of the Sihrou Hotel
column7: the two Chinese nationals were on foot and snatched a bag from a victim who was walking down the street.------Both tried to escape but were instantly caught by police. The two suspects were named as YANG LIE
column8: a 20 year old tourist and XIE JIAN
column9: also 20.------Authorities are building a case according to the procedure to bring the perpetrators to the court to decide their fate.
